name: React TypeScript Starter
description: A modern React application boilerplate with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and essential tooling configured. Perfect for starting new React projects with best practices.
author: BoilerplateHub Team

name: Next.js SaaS Starter Kit
description: Complete SaaS application boilerplate with authentication, payments, dashboard, and admin panel. Built with Next.js, Prisma, and Stripe integration.
author: SaaS Builders

name: Express.js API Boilerplate
description: RESTful API boilerplate with Express.js, MongoDB, JWT authentication, rate limiting, and comprehensive API documentation with Swagger.
author: API Architects

name: Vue.js Nuxt Starter
description: Modern Vue.js application with Nuxt 3, TypeScript, Pinia for state management, and TailwindCSS for styling. Includes SEO optimization and PWA support.
author: Vue Community

name: Flutter Firebase App
description: Cross-platform mobile app boilerplate with Flutter and Firebase integration. Includes authentication, Firestore database, cloud functions, and push notifications.
author: Mobile Devs

name: Django REST API
description: Python Django REST framework boilerplate with PostgreSQL, JWT authentication, API documentation, Docker configuration, and comprehensive testing suite.
author: Python Pros
